thread.title: U.S. author Jacqueline Woodson receives 2018 Astrid Lindgren Memorial Award

title: U.S. author Jacqueline Woodson receives 2018 Astrid Lindgren Memorial Award
text:
U.S. author Jacqueline Woodson receives 2018 Astrid Lindgren Memorial Award 12:42pm BST - 01:32
'Brown Girl Dreaming' author wins world's largest children's and young people's literary award with an annual prize of five million Swedish crowns. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
'Brown Girl Dreaming' author wins world's largest children's and young people's literary award with an annual prize of five million Swedish crowns.
